title: Ulun Danu Beratan Temple Visit (Half-day)
overview: Visit the picturesque Ulun Danu Beratan Temple, set on Lake Beratan in the mountains of Bedugul.

stops.description: Depart for Ulun Danu Beratan Temple.
Arrive and explore the temple complex and lakeside gardens.

title: Ulun Danu Beratan Temple & Bedugul (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Ulun Danu Beratan Temple and the scenic Bedugul area.

stops.description: Depart for Ulun Danu Beratan Temple.
Arrive and explore the temple complex and lakeside gardens.
Visit the Bedugul botanical gardens or local markets.
